subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Labor and Jobs
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: With the N.B.A. in danger of losing more games from its 2011-12 schedule, some players have gone overseas, but most of the league’s All-Stars have stayed put.
snippet: With the N.B.A. in danger of losing more games from its 2011-12 schedule, some players have gone overseas, but most of the league’s All-Stars have stayed put.
